Name: Asteroid Invaders
About the game: Blast away enemies in a fast paced, frantic, space shooter that hails back to the days of classic 80s games but with updated graphics, game play, music and weaponry. Bring nukes and fight bosses in this fun adventure. If you are a fan of casual shooter games then you will definitely enjoy this game. Get ready for: - 40 Levels of Fun. - Fight over 7 different Alien Ships. - 8 Boss levels each with its own angry Boss. - 3 Different Space Aliens hidden inside Asteroids. - An array of Space Weapon. - Heat Seeking Space Missiles - Heat Seeking Space Mines. - Stationary Space Mines. - Alien Laser Shooting UFOs. - Destroy Asteroids and watch our for the ones with Alien Invaders encased in them. Save Yourself with an array of power ups including: - Shields. - Increase Fire Power - Phaser - Laser - Nukes (They Destroy Everything) Restore your health by: - Picking up stranded Pilots - Grabbing a Health Power Up
